location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, encloses the first bill of exchange for military disbursements at the Residency during the months of January, February and March 1824. Enclosure not included.
